entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@washingtonpost Dr. Phil is a mental health expert. He was talking about the mental dangers of being poor and losing jobs, businesses, homes, and loved ones. 

The problem with Fauci and Birx is they DON"T take those issues into mind when they talk about the Chinese-Coronavirus.
